issue.title: [CF 1149] Track enemy raid (de)buffs
issue.body:
Hello. Thank you for a great addon. Is it possible to track debuffs|buffs on the enemy raid at RBG just as it is done in the arena? perhaps this can be realized in the future?

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Vooly | Imported from CurseForge issue #1149 | Raw

comments.body:
Not exactly, because battleground enemies don't have unitIDs, but you can use an all-unit buff/debuff icon to do pretty much the same thing.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

More specifically, I would like to make frames that display my dot's on enemies. To make DPS afflilock a similar manner as the heal heals his raid induced by frames. Addons like Tidyplates display them in the area of my reach, but it is not frames, unfortunately.

Edited Aug 13, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Vooly

If you want to be able to click on something to cast spells on battleground enemies, then the answer is that it isn't possible, and probably never will be due to intentional limits placed by Blizzard on the addon API.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
